Description.Text:
Property Location
The Los Angeles Athletic Club is in the heart of Los Angeles, walking distance from Pershing Square and Macy's Plaza. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Orpheum Theatre and Los Angeles Central Public Library.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 72 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Frette Italian sheets. Satellite programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 1 PM
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

The Los Angeles Athletic Club is in the heart of Los Angeles, walking distance from Pershing Square and Macy's Plaza. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Orpheum Theatre and Los Angeles Central Public Library.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pershing Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Macy's Plaza - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Orpheum Theatre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Los Angeles Central Public Library - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
U.S. Bank Tower - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Museum of Neon Art - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Santee Alley - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Los Angeles Flower District - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Grand Central Market - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
World Trade Center Los Angeles - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Grammy Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Microsoft Theater - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Walt Disney Concert Hall - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
L.A. Live - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Staples Center - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Los Angeles, CA (LAX-Los Angeles Intl.) - 17.8 km / 11 mi
Burbank, CA (BUR-Bob Hope) - 19 km / 11.8 mi

The preferred airport for The Los Angeles Athletic Club is Burbank, CA (BUR-Bob Hope).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
